page.title: 17Meltham's Coal Mine
page.content: On{Tuesday 18th June, 1985}we went to visit the old{drift mine}in {Meltham.}The{coal}was used for the {mill boilers}to work{steam} {engines.}The{coal}that was brought from the{mine}was not particularly good.The{coal}was dug out by hand.In {1862}the railway station was built in {Meltham}and it brought cheaper{coal}to {Meltham}and so eventually the{pit}was forced to close down.Today there is very little vegetation on the{spoil {heap.}At the bottom of the{spoil heap there is a stream and we found pieces of{coal}in the stream washed down from the{shale.}We found three to four {mines}altogether. We also found some {clay}which we have brought back to school and put in the school kiln.
